title: Weekly rundown: CommerceIQ, Oxyzo turn unicorns; Ola to buy Avail Finance - Business Today
content: Weekly rundown: CommerceIQ, Oxyzo turn unicorns; Ola to buy Avail Finance  Business Today
description: Managed accommodation provider Stanza Living, online beauty brand Plum, and overseas-focused ed-tech platform Leverage Edu also raised significant funding rounds this week.
